remarks: Choice-free analogue of ~ iblabs .  As with ~ ibladdnc , a measurability hypothesis is needed.  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 7-Nov-2017.)
statement:
iblabsnc.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
iblabsnc.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblabsnc.m $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( abs ` B ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
iblabsnc $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( abs ` B ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
